subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Minnesota fired Tubby Smith a day after the Golden Gophers lost to Florida in the N.C.A.A. tournament. Athletic Director Norwood Teague said it was time for a “fresh set of eyes.”
snippet: Minnesota fired Tubby Smith a day after the Golden Gophers lost to Florida in the N.C.A.A. tournament. Athletic Director Norwood Teague said it was time for a “fresh set of eyes.”
